npcs.Name: Vaelin
npcs.Appearance: Tall, slender elf with piercing green eyes and long silver hair. Pale, luminescent skin. Wears leather armor in shades of green and brown, with a longbow, arrows, and short swords.
npcs.Personality: Calm, introspective, cautious, observant, protective of nature, and ruthless in combat.
Quirks: Converses with animals or plants, believing them to be sentient.
Often gets lost in thought, especially in natural surroundings.
npcs.Motivation: Investigating a corrupted ancient tree causing disturbances in the forest. Seeks to understand and stop the corruption.
Activities: Exploring and investigating the dungeon for signs of unnatural corruption.
Forming alliances with adventurers who respect nature.
Documenting unique or mutated flora and fauna in the dungeon.

npcs.Name: Grimm Hollowshade
npcs.Appearance: Tall and muscular with a slightly greenish tinge to his skin, Grimm has deep-set eyes under a heavy brow, sharp tusks protruding from his lower lip, and long, unkempt black hair. He dresses in a mix of fine bardic garments and rugged travel clothes.
npcs.Voice: Deep and gravelly, with an unexpectedly melodious tone when he sings or recites poetry.
npcs.Personality: Surprisingly eloquent and charming, Grimm defies the stereotypical image of a half-orc with his wit and love for the arts. He's empathetic and often meditates on the duality of his heritage.
Quirks: Often hums or strums on his lute while thinking.
Has a habit of speaking in rhymes or lyrical prose.
Is fascinated by ancient love stories and epic poems.
npcs.Motivation: Seeking inspiration for his magnum opus, a grand epic poem, Grimm explores the dungeon to experience adventure and uncover ancient lore.
Activities: Composing songs and poems about his travels.
Entertaining fellow travelers or creatures in the dungeon with his bardic performances.
Collecting rare and ancient texts or artifacts of cultural significance.

npcs.Name: Eldon Quickwhistle
npcs.Appearance: Small stature, bright green eyes, messy brown hair, and a wide smile, wearing a leather vest and dark trousers.
npcs.Voice: High-pitched and quick, often speaks with a playful tone.
npcs.Personality: Curious, mischievous, and friendly, always looking for a bit of fun in every situation.
Quirks: Always whistles a tune when nervous
Can't resist a good riddle or puzzle
npcs.Motivation: Seeking a legendary gem rumored to be hidden deep within the dungeon.

npcs.Name: Eldranas Silvergleam
npcs.Appearance: Tall and slender with long silver hair, piercing blue eyes, and wearing a robe adorned with arcane symbols.
npcs.Voice: Calm, with a hint of arrogance. Speaks slowly, emphasizing each word.
npcs.Personality: Intelligent and curious, yet slightly detached and condescending.
Quirks: Frequently consults a small, mysterious book
Has a habit of talking to himself
npcs.Motivation: Seeking ancient magical knowledge believed to be hidden within the dungeon.

npcs.Name: Grimtuck Ironheart
npcs.Appearance: Stocky and muscular with a thick beard braided with iron rings, battle scars across his face.
npcs.Voice: Gruff and loud, with a strong dwarven accent.
npcs.Personality: Brave and straightforward, but can be stubborn and quick to anger.
Quirks: Tells tall tales of past battles
npcs.Motivation: Looking for a legendary weapon said to be hidden in the dungeon.

npcs.Name: Seraphina Lightfeather
npcs.Appearance: Tall and elegant with golden hair and eyes that shimmer like stars. Radiates a gentle, ethereal light.
npcs.Voice: Soft and melodious, with a calming presence.
npcs.Personality: Compassionate and wise, yet fiercely protective of those in need.
npcs.Motivation: On a divine mission to cleanse the dungeon of an ancient evil.

npcs.Name: Borin Shadowstep
npcs.Appearance: Short and agile, with mischievous green eyes and dark hair. Wears light leather armor and a cloak.
npcs.Voice: Quick and witty, often with a playful tone.
npcs.Personality: Clever and resourceful, but also a bit overconfident.
npcs.Motivation: Seeking a legendary hidden treasure within the dungeon.

npcs.Name: Thalassa Wavecrest

Spells.Name: Water Breathing
Spells.Effect: Up to 10 creatures can breathe underwater

npcs.Appearance: Blue-green skin, long flowing hair like seaweed, and eyes like the ocean depths. Wears a cloak made of kelp.
npcs.Voice: Melodic and soothing, like the sound of waves.
npcs.Personality: Calm and wise, yet fiercely protective of the natural world.
npcs.Motivation: Protecting an ancient underwater relic from falling into the wrong hands.
